info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Isolated strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark, west central Broadwater and northern Jefferson Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 526 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking isolated strong thunderstorms along the Jefferson and Lewis and Clark County border, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City, Rimini, Alhambra, Spring Meadow Lake State Park and Clancy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
